name: xmlElemNew
description: Creates an XML document object element

params.name: xmlobj
params.description: The name of an XML object. An XML document or an element.

params.name: namespace
params.description: URI of the namespace to which this element belongs.

params.name: childname
params.description:
The name of the element to create. This element becomes a
 child element of xmlObj in the tree.
